website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for small backyards or indoor use.
pros: The Bounce Land house was a bit on the smaller side, so it can easily fit into any space both indoors or outdoors
It works well for 2-3 toddlers at once
Set up and take down were simple and quick
The castle was lightweight and easily portable
We loved the added basketball hoop, which worked well for tossing small balls
We also found the slide to be sturdy and easy to slide down
This castle also came with a durable carrying case
cons: The entrance is slightly too big
we suggest stacking some pillows at the opening to avoid anyone falling out

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot smaller than your traditional bounce house... but, it's great for my 6 and (almost) 2 year old. They can both play in there and have so much fun bouncing and going down the slide. We just gave it as a birthday gift 2 days ago, and I guarantee it's already been used for 10+ hours! Seems to be very durable and well-made. We would buy this 100 times over again!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Rude

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star cattle BUT, this company, just like most others provide a carry bag that is too small. I was able to squeeze it in, but it took way too much effort. Buy it. It's a nice size and well made. Just know the bag is to frigging small!!
customer_reviews.author: AntneeLINY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertainment for the kids
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 2 years now and still going strong! Every birthday party and family event we bring this out and let the kids have fun with it. It usually has 3-4 kids (2-5 year olds) bouncing around in it. The weight limit, being 100lbs, has been tested by the older kids (80-120lbs) trying to hang out with the younger kids. It held up great even though I didn't see them jumping in it. Tough material, something I was worried about, hasn't had any issues with 40+ unpacking/packing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Super happy! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for! Big enough to hold 4-5 kids and small enough to bring indoors if needed. Very durable! We love it! So pleased as it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Citti

customer_reviews.title: but I love this! I have 3 little ones who love ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not write many reviews, but I love this! I have 3 little ones who love their bounce house. I was very picky when I bought this and read reviews on many many many bounce houses in this price range. I felt this was the safest option, the most enclosed area ( with smallest entrance/openings), the best slide, strong material, and best reviews. We have used this inside and outside. This is very easy to start up and take down. The only thing is I wish was the side opening would Velcro together the entire length of the opening, but I love this! Great way to get the wiggles out in the northern winters! Oh and very fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: 3littles

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE BOUNCE HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent purchase! Very easy to inflate! Sturdy and durable. Bought this for my granddaughter for her fourth birthday (during the shelter-in-place), as she jumped she yelled at the to of her voice “this is so much fun, I feel like a kid again”. This bouncer has provided hours of fun. Great value for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginamareez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at-home use for small kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this bouncy house!! It is the perfect size for smaller kids (ours are 2 and 4). Can reasonably hold up to 5 toddlers/preschoolers (always watch the weight and size limit, of course). My son loves the slide. It holds up well, and we've had to drag it around the yard and in and out of the garage. It event got left out in the rain one night (oops) and totally survived! We just had to let it run a while the next day to force out the water and dry it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had this bounce house for very long just yet, but we love it! The kids love it! It's easy to set up and tear down. The storage bag seems like it might not last as long, but that's okay. We can always put the house in a storage bin. I love how the basketball hoop breaks away. Because, of course, the first thing my kids do is put their heads in there... -__- LOL So since the hoop just has Velcro holding it together, it comes apart when those babies make bad choices. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size. However when you have small children in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size. However when you have small children in and jumping it becomes dangerous. If one child is going down and some are jumping inside it propels the child going down to fall off the side. I had that happen too many times and I would like to return mine for something better. The yellow siding should be higher in order to stop children from going over before they reach the bottom. Would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised! My grandkids have spent many hours having the best time! Easy up, easy down! I would definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOUNCY HOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS BOUNCY HOUSE FOR MY DAUGHTER 4 YEARS OLD AND SHE LOVES IT. You can bring it indoors and use it for out door use too. It does sit at & 7 1/2 feet tall and it fits in her room. Great buy for parents looking to get something to start with instead of a trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I was surprised at how durable and well made this was. Great toy for a big span of ages. Unfortunately, the bag that it comes in will never again hold the bounce house. Invest in a very large tub to store it in. We left it outside (in a Rubbermaid tub) all winter and it got water in it. It did get mildewy but I filled it up one day, washed the entire area with a solution of bleach and water and left it out to dry in the sun. It really cleaned up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product and wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! This bounce house is very well made. The fabric looks like it ought to last for years. My grandchildren ages 2, 3 and 5 have been using it almost every day since Christmas, and believe me they are anything but gentle! I did have a freak problem with the blower not being able to properly start up again after the first use for some strange reason, which gave me the "opportunity" of testing out Bounceland's customer service ;-) My experience with their prompt and friendly customer service totally sold me on this company! They sent me out a new blower immediately, and didn't even bother asking me to send the old blower back.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 yo quarantine birthday She loved it. I didn’t love the price going up $60 in days from when quarantine started but what can u do ?
customer_reviews.author: Laura1234

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Omg this lasted 5 years and I am surprised it lasted that long with the amount of kids that got to enjoy this bounce house! 4 kids 2 nieces and countless friends! They popped it because they became to old for it!
customer_reviews.author: Yinnette Luna

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandkids love this. Purchase for their Christmas Present, and they have such a great time in it. Hopefully they will enjoy for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: After hours of researching and reading reviews I decided to order this Bounceland Castle Bounce House for mygrandchildren for Christmas. I am very pleased with my decision. It is easy set up and take down. It seems to be constructed well and our granddaughters both age 3, absolutely love it! We are having to set it up inside because of winter weather so it has not been used as much as it will be when we can move it outdoors. The only negative thing I can say about this product so far is that the storage bag is not adaquate. We purchased another bag to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, larger than a lot of the smaller non-commercial bouncers!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I got this for my son's 2nd birthday party and it was a big hit!!! At first when I put him in alone before the party to see his reaction he was a bit scared, but I put some of the plastic balls from his ball pit in there and got in with him to show him it was ok. The kids had a BLAST! Even the older kids wanted to join. I told them to make sure and be 10 and under and gentle. It's still alive and kicking!
customer_reviews.author: Ziv Gonen

customer_reviews.title: This castle has provided hours of fun for our grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: This castle has provided hours of fun for our grandchildren. It fits perfectly in our basement, and is durable, and fun. The kids love the slide, and it is easily set up, and big enough for several children to use together.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fun bounce house
customer_reviews.text: The bounce house is a good size and fits 3 - 4 toddlers at once without worry that they will bump into each other for lack of space. The only complait that I have, and why it didn't get a 5 star, is that the plug doesn't fit in our outside plugs b/c we have a box around our outlet & the plug is too big to fit inside the box. That was feustrating to learn so we have to turn the bounce house backwards so that we can't see the slide when we're inside and instead see the back part of the bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Present I've ever Given to a Two-Year Old for Her Birthday...Instant Succuess!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter talked us into getting this as the present for our 2 year old granddaughter and boy I'm glad I did. It has been six months and they have used this over 30 times. It inflates in about 20 seconds and deflates in about a minute. The carrying/storage bag is very handy. This travels with them to other friends homes and becomes an instant hit. Very durable and easy to clean. The size it about 12 by 12 outside and 10 by 10 inside so about 4 toddlers is about all it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Keesee

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house is very sturdy and a lot of fun. Was a little disappointed in the size I thought it would be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie zirbel

customer_reviews.title: Use it ALL the time
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous bouce house. We set it up inside or in the garage when we need to entertain our little zoo and the weather is yucky. We used it every day for over a month when we first got it, It has been used by 5 or 6, 2-4 year olds at a time with no problem. We use a tarp under it when we go outside just in case there is moisture on the ground. We don't want to deal with any mold issues since it isn't waterproof. My boys don't really care about the hoop but they may grow into that. Great purchase for this busy mama. Many hours of entertainment for the neighborhood kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!!
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house is perfect!!!!!! Sets up in less than 3 minutes and just as long to take down!!!!! I’m impressed by the quality for the money!!!!!! This is for our 2 and 1 year old but it also held my 13 year old!!!! One of my best finds on amazon and super fast shopping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Raine

customer_reviews.title: ... house for our two kids and we are very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bouncy house for our two kids and we are very pleased with the product. It's made from durable material and it is made to last. I was amazed at how quickly it fills up. The directions say that it take s 2 minutes to inflate but in my experience, it was much quicker. The fan is not that loud, either. We set it up in our house on a rainy Sunday and the kids had a blast. It's a great buy for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast shipping. Exactly as described. Item was very well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Esco

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce house, hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: We just set this up a few days ago, and it sets up easy and folds up pretty easy, too. The bag to put the bounce house back in is larger than the original packaged size, and when folded in fourths it fits with no problem. The slide was a big hit. My only issue is with the basketball hoop-there is no "backboard," so balls fly out pretty easily. They should have put the basketball hoop against one of the spires, but regardless it's a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: fountained

customer_reviews.title: This Bouny Castle is lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I have had this almost 2 years now and it has been a lot of fun. The Castle is just the right size for 2 to 3 kids. It allows them to bounce together and slide down the slide. The kids love coming over to play in it. They use the Basketball hoop and slam dunk all day. The Fan does a great job of keeping it inflated but can grow annoying if you are trying to have a conversation. It is rated for 250 lbs and has been tested to this limit. It is a great toy for the kids. It does require a bit of set-up and take down but it is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Roy

customer_reviews.title: 100% Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: Your kids will love this bounce house. Bought it for my 2 foster kids 3 years ago. It is still in great condition. We make sure it's clean and dry after each use. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: A great bounce castle for 2-5 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bounce castle for my daughter's 2nd birthday and it's provided countless hours of entertainment since. It sets up easy enough with proper planning (we lay a tarp down underneath but probably don't need to) and can be inflated/deflated in minutes. We've had 4 and 5 year olds in it and it holds up to their abuse as well. 4-6 small children could comfortably play on/around it at a time. We've probably completely set it up and taken it down 20 times already and so far no issues. Solid construction and design. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: SO much FUN!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's fourth birthday party! SO glad I did!!! Well constructed, easy set up, very reasonable noise level, and comes with repair patches (haven't needed them yet, but glad to have them included) shipped quickly and wasn't super heavy! I fit it in my Living room to test set up but it was a very tight fit. Kid's think I am awesome, and I'm taking all the credit. (Thanks bouncy land for a great product!)
customer_reviews.author: Ashleed

customer_reviews.title: Very Tall Power Plug
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and take down, and our kids love it. Be advised that the power plug is about 6 inches tall, and may require replacing your current outdoor outlet cover with a low profile one like this one in order for the plug to be flush with the outlet:
customer_reviews.author: David Alpers

customer_reviews.title: Needs bigger stakes but still a fun house
customer_reviews.text: Great bounce house, a little smaller than I had anticipated but still fits 3 little guys comfortably. My only complaint would be the stakes that hold it in the ground. They are very small and a wind gust pulled them right out if the ground with children inside. Not an overly powerful gust of wind either but still managed to pull from the ground and fly over the fence into the neighbors yard. Luckily the only thing injured was my daughters psyche. Great house just be careful. My poor girl is terrified of it now, starts hyperventilating just at the mention of getting it out. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWNET PALMER

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house is smaller than I anticipated but that was my fault for not checking the dimensions. Besides that, this is a great deal for the price. It comes with a pump and a storage bag. Our boys are 6 & 2 (both are very big for their ages, 60lbs & 40lbs), and they have also had two more kids with them in there before. More than 4 kids at a time is probably unrealistic though. The basketball hoop comes apart often but that doesn't seem to make a difference for them. Overall, definitely worth the money! You can hardly rent them at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson817

customer_reviews.title: they love it, its great
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than I thought it would be, and the side exit could have a more secure closure. The Velcro only attaches in a few places, instead of all the way down and across the bottom. This creates a high risk of small children tumbling out of the side while bouncing from wall to wall, but I would never allow my grandchildren to be in it unsupervised anyway. Other wise, they love it, its great, and I can even set it up inside on a rainy day!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C.

customer_reviews.title: Sold it at a yard sell and now being loved by a new family
customer_reviews.text: We used this for several years and had no problems with it. Our kids have grown up a little and we live in a smaller yard. Sold it at a yard sell and now being loved by a new family.
customer_reviews.author: buzzsawddog

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: THis is a very durable item. I rated it as educational as my kids can figure it out, including the 4 yr old. They play a fun game with it where they turn it on and jump inside while it fills. THen they go out, turn it off and jump in while it inflates. This goes on for about an hour, then they jump for awhile and it starts again. It has taken this abuse quite well. My only complaint it the little bag that somehow you are supposed to shove the thing into. Not happening.
customer_reviews.author: hlshelley

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of renting one for my little one’s birthday and desided to spend a little bot more and have something fun for the winter. Love this! Good material, super quick delivery. My little one had a blast and great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Charon

customer_reviews.title: Excellant , Very Strudy , We are so happy we bought this product she plays with it every day
customer_reviews.text: We love it.. My granddaughter loves it we get in a jump with her so I would say you can have at least 300 lbs limit ..Excellent we have played with this everyday since Christmas...
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: Bounceland Castle W/Hoop Inflatable Bounce House Bouncer
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our Granddaughter's birthday and it made her party a big hit! Even the bigger kids were having a great time in it. I was very surprised at the size of it and the quality as well. It's set up now for the 3rd summer and it is still one of her favorite play stations outside! Kudos to Bounceland!! Awesome fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Leroll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great, big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my small children, they love it. We've used it countless times for the last 2 summers. We used it for their birthdays, family gatherings, etc. If you have children over age 8 don't get it because it's a little small..I would say this is good for ages 2 to 7 yrs old and wouldnt put any more than 6 kids in at a time. It does blow up really fast..within 2minutes and folds down really small to fit into a small carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Henderson

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 year old son's birthday party and it was awesome! we had 4 toddlers in here and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Updating this review, because we are still so happy with this bounce house, now that my son is 4 and we still don’t have any problems. Had it for 2 years and we bring it out a couple times a month, at least! Original review: Bought this for my 2 year old son's birthday party and it was awesome! we had 4 toddlers in here and they all had fun!
customer_reviews.author: New mom

customer_reviews.title: Had it for years.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as one of my daughters gifts for her 2nd birthday. Now, almost 3 years later, we still use it. Since, we have had a son, and both kids absolutely love it. We have never had any problems. It folds up nicely, blows up fast and is an absolute joy for any other children that come over. We've had older kids in there as well and never had an issue with it. It is a bit loud, but it is quieter than other bounce houses that neighbors have bought for their children! Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: AlexSchief

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This house is so much fun! It was delivered quickly and it’s so easy to setup. Goes up in seconds and was a snap to take down and put away again as well. Great that it comes with a bag that can hold the fan and house. Very happy with this so far, we’ve only used it one time though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily N

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: exceeded expectations. super easy to inflate & deflate. worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for Xmas. Well worth the money. Inflates in a matter of seconds, tear down easy as well. Folding up into the bag for storage is a challenge but as expected with any large item. Used on a daily basis, and birthday parties. Would highly recommend this product. After a year of a lot of use, it's still as durable as it was a year ago. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Sumergold
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this!!! We got this for my daughters 4th birthday and she hasn't stopped playing with it yet!! I haven't had it for that long but seems real durable, and that is why I choose this one over little tikes. Set up was a breeze and take down was less then 5 minutes. I set it up by myself today with no problem!! We put a tarp under it though to protect the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof5

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still going!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have had it for 3 years without issue. Midwest cold winters need something for kids to blow off steam. Have been way over weight limit. I have gotten in it with my daughter. I'm 5' 11" 220 lbs. We put in our basement. she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkid Magnet
customer_reviews.text: We have had our Bounceland Castle for over 12 months, mainly for our grandkids' use. It is easy to store and set up in our backyard and our toddler to preschool aged grandkids enjoy themselves enormously. It works for about 3 to 4 kids at a time. The quality has been great, but we do not leave it out overnight or in wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our 4yo birthday party. It was very easy to set up and so far very durable. We had 2-4 small children bouncing at once and it held up very well, no issues. Happy we purchased this instead of renting for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Reiannah Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 9 year old daughters loooved this!!! Fit perfectly in our basement for winter days. They played in it all year long though.
customer_reviews.author: sarah d

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a few years ago and it has definitely been put through the test. We have 3 kids (6, 4 and 3). They have LOVED playing on this thing. It's held up well. Not sure why other people are having such a hard time putting it back in the bag it came in. If you take your time and fold it properly, it goes in the bag without a problem every single time. Would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Damon Sipe

customer_reviews.title: Small jump space
customer_reviews.text: It's an nice looking bounce house but I prefer the Little Tikes brand because it gives more jump room.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best money we've spent in ages.
customer_reviews.text: Best $$ we've spent in a while on our kids. We have 3 kids ages 6 and younger. It kept them busy for hours Pros - Its portable and we have brought to friends homes and on vacation. Provides great exercise for little ones! Cons - None.
customer_reviews.author: Lori T.

customer_reviews.title: Held up so far!
customer_reviews.text: We have two year old twins. . . this has held up so far over half a summer and multiple uses. Kids love it. It's big enough for four kids or so (under the age of 5) to be in there at the same time without having to worry about kids bumping heads with each other. Set-up and take-down are easy and even after MULTIPLE uses, the castle is still easy to fit into the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: TJG

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 & 6 year old have been using this bounce house daily for the last three weeks. We use it indoors. It inflates in about a minute. The seams are durable, it is plenty sturdy enough to handle their weights (45 and 70 lbs) even when both boys and the 8 1/2 year old neighbor are all in there at the same time. They are getting lots of exercise and burning winter energy. What more could I want? Before I bought it, I was worried that for the price this would be a flimsy unit, but I had absolutely nothing to worry about! This unit is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina K. Nord

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have to say awesome decent size i have an 8,6,&2 yr old boys keeps them entertained for awhile blows up fast good material so far and it came super fast was not ezpecting to get it gor atleast a week and a half came in a few days i never spend this kind of money on material things but im glad i did
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great bound house
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy to set it up, it takes about 5 min. And the kids love it, it has very good quality on the stitches and the material. I have been using it for about 2 years and it is perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Chacin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old for her birthday and its paid for itself already. To rent a small bouncy castle would be at least 80-100 bucks. We can pull it out whenever the weather is good and she can wear herself out. The construction is good for a residential grade bouncy castle and its just the right size for her age. Its easy to set up and take down...I'd say 3-5 minutes for either. I would advise you put some cushions right outside the entrance in case a little one rolls out when the flap is open. its not a high drop, but would save on tears if its on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for indoor/outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for indoor/outdoor. My 2 year old loves it brings all his toys in there and jumps for hours. It an awesome form of babysitting (total JK for the overprotective people out there) Only suggestion is might want to invest in a more powerful blower if you plan on having multiple kids in their at a time. Love will buy a bigger water one for outside from Bounceland.
customer_reviews.author: David Januszewski

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I was expecting! Easy to set up and thick material. My kids are 1 and 3 and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilymbailey

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our daughters birthday party figuring in the long run it was more cost effective than renting one. It lasted a couple years, but now that all her friends are a couple years older, they have exceeded the weight limit. On her 5th birthday with about 6 kids in it, the seam blew open at the bottle of the slide.Still was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: yjkoh

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce house
customer_reviews.text: We love this bounce house. Perfect size for our yard.
customer_reviews.author: valerie g

product_meta.title: Bounceland Bounce House Castle with Basketball Hoop Inflatable Bouncer, Fun Slide, Safe Velcro Entrance, UL Certified Strong Blower Included, 12 ft x 9 ft x 7 ft H, Kid Castle Party Theme Bounce House
product_meta.description:
Product Description 

 * 12 ft L x 9 ft W x 7 ft H inflated size
 * Velcro opening for safe and easy access into and out of the bouncer
 * Powered by a strong UL blower (included)
 * Heavy-duty commercial grade material bouncing surface
 * Heavy-duty puncture proof materials with double to quadruple stitches
 * Strong 9" stakes to secure the bounce house to the ground
 * Long (approx. 6 ft) fill tube allows blower to be placed away from the bouncer
 * Easy set up and take down
 * Inflates in less than a minute.
 * Indoor and Outdoor Use




 Package includes 

 * 12' L x 9' W x 7' H bounce house.
 * 115V, 60Hz, 3.8A, 0.6 HP UL certified blower with 25 ft. power cord and GFCI plug (Recommended for all electronic toys by the American Consumer Safety Committee).
 * Basket ball hoop.
 * Ground stakes pack.
 * Large carrying bag.
 * Repair kit and instructions.



Weight limit recommendations 
Recommended for ages 3 and up. Maximum individual weight: 100 lbs. Maximum individual height: 5 ft. 

Warranty 
We want to make sure you're completely satisfied with our products. All of our water slides come with a 30-day limited warranty*, and blowers come with a one-year limited warranty. * Please note that our warranty is only valid for normal use not for rental or other commercial use. To prevent mildew, do not store inflatable unit when wet. Keep unit inflated with blower on until completely dry. Our products are for the U.S and Canadian markets only, they are not suitable for other countries. [Quality Assurance] 1) Heavy-duty puncture proof material with double to quadruple stitches for a highly durable inflatable bouncer 2) Half way velcro opening for safe and easy access into and out of the bouncer 3) Bouncing surface made with heavy-duty commercial grade material for better bouncing fun and a durable, long-lasting bounce house 4) Strong secure 9" ground stakes 5) 6 ft Long air intake tube 6) Basketball hoop with velcro connection for safety.

[Safety Standards] Bounceland products have been tested and approved for meeting and exceeding current world-wide requirements. We have been certified by ASTM (consumer safety), 16CFR1500.3/16CFR1505 (materials safety), CPSC (manufacturer certified), and UL (blower certified) with 25 ft power cord and GFCI plug (Recommended for all electronic toys by the American Consumer Safety Committee). Note: 120V only for northern American market
